roleset.name: bias

example.name: All args, Arg-2 adjectival
example.text: As much as possible should be learned in the first lessons , in order to prepossess the pupils favorably .

example.name: Passive, with Arg-2 instrumental
example.text: Chatelart was prepossessed with an opinion that it belonged to the Duke of Nemours .

propbank.arg: with an opinion that it belonged to the Duke of Nemours

example.name: All args
example.text: His experience had not been likely to prepossess him in favour of the popular voice .

propbank.arg: in favour of the popular voice

example.name: All args
example.text: The Duchess of Valentinois prepossessed the King against it .

roleset.note: PREPOSSESS-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. No Vncls. Comparison to ?prejudice.01?. Roleset by Julia. (from prepossess.01-v)
Arg-2, the bias, may be expressed adjectivally or prepositionally (favorably, with the opinion that..., in his favor..., against..., etc.) (from prepossess.01-v)
